about_the_game:
Officer graphics for 3rd Generation Gamer's Angel "Chihiro Ikki/Shiki Aoki" will be added.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT ORIGINAL OFFICERS" choose "CREATE ORIGINAL OFFICER" and select the Female Auto-create face graphic. The face graphic selection screen will appear. Choose the Weekly Famitsu 3rd Generation Gamer's Angel "Chihiro Ikki/Shiki Aoki" from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in the MAIN MODE.
detailed_description:
Officer graphics for 3rd Generation Gamer's Angel "Chihiro Ikki/Shiki Aoki" will be added.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT ORIGINAL OFFICERS" choose "CREATE ORIGINAL OFFICER" and select the Female Auto-create face graphic. The face graphic selection screen will appear. Choose the Weekly Famitsu 3rd Generation Gamer's Angel "Chihiro Ikki/Shiki Aoki" from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in the MAIN MODE.

fullgame.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII

name: RTK13 - Weekly Famitsu tie-up Officer CG “3rd Generation Gamer's Angel Chihiro Ikki/Shiki Aoki” 週刊ファミ通タイアップ武将CG「3代目ゲーマーズエンジェル 一木千洋/青木志貴」

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over

short_description: Officer graphics for 3rd Generation Gamer's Angel "Chihiro Ikki" and "Shiki Aoki" will be added.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
